# React Instructions

> This is a reference file for GitHub Copilot.
> The authoritative version is maintained at `.ai/standards/code/react.md`

## Quick Rules

- **Components:** Functional components with hooks
- **Props:** TypeScript interfaces for all props
- **State:** useState/useReducer patterns

## Full Standards

For complete React coding standards, see:
- **Primary source:** [.ai/standards/code/react.md](../../.ai/standards/code/react.md)

Apply these standards to all React code in this project.

---

**Note:** This file exists for GitHub Copilot compatibility. All updates should be made to `.ai/standards/code/react.md` which is the single source of truth.
